text: is a Japanese anime and theatre director. He has also provided key animation for many anime. Most prominently he has directed Ef: A Tale of Memories. He was previously working with Shaft alongside Akiyuki Shinbo until the end of 2009, and is currently employed by Silver Link as the studio's most prominent director. ==Works== ===as Director=== This list is for series in which Ōnuma is credited as either or . ====Television series==== {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; margin=auto; " !scope="col" width=5%| Year !scope="col" width=20%| Title !scope="col" width=15%| Co-director(s) !scope="col" width=10%| Studio !scope="col" class="unsortable"| !scope="col" class="unsortable"| Storyboard !scope="col" class="unsortable"| Episode !scope="col" class="unsortable"| Ref(s) |- |2005 |Paniponi Dash!
